content: Is anyone on here from any of the National Release Centres (ADHA/NEHTA, HSCIC etc) or even IHTSDO? I have a query about a recent release that has changed structurally (UK). I've already emailed HSCIC but haven't heard back.
There's people here from USA and Au, but I don't know of anyone from UK
AU would be fine, just to confirm something around the structure which has changed between releases.
@Dion McMurtrie @Michael Lawley that would be you...

I'm guessing this is about the removal of the RF2Release directory?
FWIW I don't like that change as it seems gratuitous and only has a detrimental effect on existing systems without any significant upside.
I believe this has followed a decision by the IHTSDO's TRAG in Wellington
